alert.note: Alert for Crisp; Dooly; Sumter (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 19 at 12:49PM EDT by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Dooly, southeastern Sumter and Crisp Counties through 115 PM EDT... At 1249 PM EDT, a strong thunderstorm was over Georgia Veterans Memorial St Pk, or 8 miles west of Cordele, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Up to 40 mph wind, frequent cloud to ground lightning and heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects. Heavy rain may cause temporary street flooding especially in poor drainage areas. Locations impacted include... Cordele, Vienna, Cobb, East Crisp, Fort Early, Georgia Veterans Memorial St Pk, Richwood, Raines, Tremont, Wenona and Hatley. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: People outdoors should seek shelter immediately. If you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning. Motorists should slow down and be prepared for possible loss of control due to hydroplaning.
